title: Deals / Coupon Advertising Online Business
text: So right up front here are the main elements you will need to have: - Advertising sales background. If you have sold coupons, coupon books etc...this is perfect and the next generation for this market.THIS IS THE MOST IMPORTANT INGREDIENT. - Must live in proximity to at least 100,000 population. This means cities not towns. If you live or can get to a tourist destination this is a big income plus for you. - Have knowledge of how to use the internet. - Must have a small investment in capital. We ask this as we know an investment makes people try harder. Plain and Simple. - If you are publisher of a print circular this is the future. - Must have the TIME TO BUILD THE BUSINESS for residual sales. If you have the above lets move forward. We build the sites for your area at no cost. You get your own URL web site and your exclusive territory. Grow this business and consider selling it back to us. We maintain the site at no cost to you. NO FEES. We want you to concentrate on SALES. Currently we have 3 products to meet every level of advertising budget. Included will be our patent pending software so you will see in real time your sales and the deals being utilized so you can go back and sell the advertisers every month. Trackable advertising with a new twist and user interaction! We know that small to medium local businesses want to increase sales with very little effort. This is why we developed our program online not in the printed format. (Note - they can print if they want). We know that Groupons and Living Social are not the best programs for this size of businesses. So you are free to call, make appointments and sell. Our administrative site allows you to generate an advertisement online with the advertiser's logo and tag line. Then when you are in front of them you can simply put the copy right into their ad. Once they love it, they click approve the ''Proof'' you take a check or credit card and make the next call. Financials
